There are also plenty of moto taxis nearby to go wherever you need if you don‚Äôt want to walk. Their place is very secure, always locked but they open up quickly when you return. The breakfast is simple but good, one egg with toast, juice or fruit, coffee or tea. There is also a communal kitchen. Her and her husband are really good, kind people and I highly recommend staying here when in Puerto Lopez. Osvaldo has great sense of humor :) They also offer laundry service if you need.
